Update date: June 29, 2022
Effective date: June 29, 2022
Update prompt
In order to fully protect your rights, we have updated the "Guidelines for Privacy Property Protection of QQ Speed Mobile Games" in conjunction with laws and regulations.
If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us according to Article 9 described in Article 9 of this guideline.
The main changes in this update are as follows:
label: Policy Change

text: 1. In order to explain the security strategy of game products more clearly, we have explained more detailed explanation of the personal information processing rules in the game's anti -cheating and anti -plug -in scenarios;
label: Policy Change

text: 2., increased the product's instructions for the use of sensor information;
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Increased product instructions for the use of sensor information

text: 3. Optimize other text expressions.
label: Policy Change

text: overview
You are welcome to choose Tencent Games and related services jointly provided by Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. and Shenzhen Tencent Tianyou Technology Co., Ltd.!

In addition to the "Game Privacy Protection Guidelines" and "Game License and Service Agreement", we will also further refine it to you through the "QQ Speed Mobile Game Privacy Protection Guide" ("This Guideline")."(" Game Products "or" Products ") When we collect, use, store, and share personal information, as well as related rights you enjoy, this guidance is part of the" Game License and Service Agreement ".

If there is no special explanation, Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. and Shenzhen Tencent Tianyou Technology Co., Ltd. are collectively referred to as Tencent (or us) in this guideline.35 floors of Tencent Building, Tencent Building, Maling Community Science and Technology;
label: Contact Information

text: Tencent Tianyou Company's registration place is 523 rooms for Block A, Block A, Block A, No. 6, Baoxing Road, Haiwang District, Xin'an Street, Baoan District, Shenzhen.
label: Important
Contact Information

text: The points are as follows:

• In order to provide you with basic services such as gaming entertainment and interactive and consumption related to this player, we need to collect your account and login information, game log information, equipment information, consumption information.

rewrite: We need to collect your account and login information, game log information, equipment information, consumption information.

text: For details, please check the first part of this guideline.

text: • In order to better protect the physical and mental health of minors and promote the healthy access of minors, we may implement more stringent anti -addiction measures on the basis of the state's relevant national online game anti -addiction policy regulations.
At the same time, we also continue to study and test new technologies that protect minors.

For example, in order to further improve the accuracy of real -name authentication and to maximize the minors from using the identity information of others, we may use the face recognition verification identity in some games or for some users (based on specific game strategies), and use face face recognitionAt this time, we will use the identity verification ability provided by Tencent Health System to verify the WeChat or QQ account (depending on your login account) you currently log in and use. Tencent Health System needs to collect your real identity information for identity verification.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: When using the face recognition function, Tencent Health System will apply for your device camera/camera permissions through WeChat or QQ to complete the face recognition.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Tencent Health System will apply for your device camera/camera authority through WeChat or QQ to complete face recognition.

text: • The above -mentioned face recognition verification mainly compares the user's real facial information with the data source of the Public Security's authoritative data platform.
If the result is inconsistent or the user refuses to verify, we will uniformly regard them as a 12 -year -old and below minor and include the corresponding anti -addiction supervision.
label: Specific Audiences

text: Related verification data for face recognition is only used to compare with the authoritative data platform of public security after encryption, and we will not keep it.
label: Data Retention
Data Security

text: • We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that your personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security.
label: Data Security

text: You can learn more detailed personal information processing rules through reading the full version of "QQ Speed Mobile Game Privacy Protection Guide" to understand the corresponding relationship of personal information types and uses.

text: 2. Personal information sharing, transfer and public disclosure
2.1 Personal information sharing
Except for this guideline and the situation stipulated in the "Game License and Service Agreement", without your consent, we will not actively share your personal information to third parties.

If you have other personal information that shared your personal information or you need us to share your personal information into a third party to surpass the original authorization purpose, we will directly or indirectly obtain your consent of your behavior through this third party.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: If you have other personal information that shared your personal information or you need us to share your personal information into a third party to surpass the original authorization purpose, we will directly or indirectly obtain your consent of your behavior through this third party.

text: In order to achieve specific purposes, the scene of sharing information with third parties is as follows:
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: 1) Minor protection
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: For the collection of personal information of minors, please refer to Article 7 of this guideline.
label: First Party Collection Information

When you use other products or services operated by Tencent ("related products"), after you are clearly authorized, we will bind the account number you choose this game product with related products andThe avatar, record, or other information you authorize are shared with related products to show you or other users in the affiliated product, so that you can participate in game welfare activities in related products, and receive corresponding benefits.

text: 4. Information security
4.1 Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.

text: We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that user personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security, including technological protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.

text: In addition, the relevant system of our game has also passed the record and evaluation of national network security level protection (level three).

Data Security

text: We use industry -leading technical protection measures.
The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.

Data Security

4.2 Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leaks and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent security incidents from expanding.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If personal information leaks and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent security incidents from expanding.

text: 5. Your rights

6. Change
We may revise this guidelines in a timely manner.
When the personal information collection and use rules and other laws and regulations are changed, we will prompt you the guidance after the version is updated in an appropriate manner.

Please read the change of privacy protection or guidelines after the change. You continue to use Tencent Games to indicate that you agree to collect, process or use your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.
label: Risk
Policy Change

text: 7. Minor protection
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors and continue to explore better personal information protection methods for minors.
If you are the legal guardians of the minor, please pay attention to whether the minors you monitor use your authorized consent to use the service of Tencent games or provide personal information.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are the legal guardians of the minor, please pay attention to whether the minors you monitor use your authorized consent to use the service of Tencent games or provide personal information.

label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you have doubts about the personal information of the minors you monitor, please contact us through the contact information in Article 9.

text: In particular, if you are a child under the age of 14, in order to protect the personal information of children, we have also released the Guidelines for Child Privacy Protection.
label: Specific Audiences

text: Children and their guardians should also read the "Guidelines for Child Privacy Protection" carefully before using Tencent game services.
You can use Tencent game services only after obtaining the guardian's guidelines and the "Guidelines for Child Privacy Protection".
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: You can use Tencent game services only after obtaining the guardian's guidelines and the "Guidelines for Child Privacy Protection".

By automatic intervention from the system level and restricting minors' game time and enabled offline functions, we will guide the rational game of minors.After consumption, try to contact the guardian to remind, confirm and deal with it to help minors to access the Internet.

First Party Collection Information

label: Data Security
Specific Audiences

text: At the same time, we also continue to study and test new technologies that protect minors.

In order to further improve the accuracy of real -name authentication and maximize the prevention of minors from using the identity information of others, Tencent Health System may be targeted at some users (based on specific game strategies)., Or, including the game recharge, consumption, or transaction during the game), enable face recognition verification identity. When the face recognition is used, the Tencent Health System will log in to the WeChat or QQ account that you currently log in and use) Obstocks, and you need to collect your real identity information for your identity test.

text: When opening the face recognition function, the Tencent Health System will apply for your device camera/camera authority through WeChat or QQ platform to complete face recognition.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Tencent Health System will apply for your device camera/camera authority through WeChat or QQ platform to complete face recognition.

text: The above -mentioned face recognition verification mainly compares the user's real facial information with the data source of the authoritative data platform of the Public Security. If the two comparison results are consistent, that is, successfully pass the certification, and match the corresponding game time limit according to the actual age group of the user.
If the result is inconsistent or the user refuses to verify, we will uniformly regard them as a 12 -year -old and below minor and include the corresponding anti -addiction supervision.
label: Specific Audiences

text: Related verification data for face recognition is only used to compare with the authoritative data platform of public security after encryption, and we will not keep it.
label: Data Retention

Data Security

text: 8. Others

The "Guidelines for Game Privacy Protection" is a general privacy clause for Tencent Games uniformly. The content stipulated in it includes but not limited to user rights and information security measures. It is suitable for Tencent game users.
For example, the "Guidelines for Game Privacy Protection" is inconsistent or contradictory with this guideline, please refer to this guideline.
"Guidelines for Child Privacy Protection" is a personal information protection rule for children under 14 years of age.

In the scope of the "Guidelines for Children's Privacy Protection", if it is inconsistent or contradictory with the "Guidelines for Game Privacy Protection" and this guideline, please refer to the "Guidelines for Child Privacy Protection".
